item.description:
Time to get the attention of the Holiday "Consumers" this Friday
at the Major Entrances to Buckland Hills with a good old fashioned
sign wave. Pre-event activities will include placement of Ron Paul
Yard signs and Banners at key locations allong major traffic routes
leading to the mall area. Signs and Banners are available for those
who need them.

We should be in place around 10:00 AM
Actual Meetup Location is the parking lot at:

Uno Chicago Grill
180 Deming St, Manchester

Corner of Hale Rd and Deming St.
See discussion Here

See you all there!
item.name: Black Friday Sign and Banner Wave- Buckland Hills Mall
